data.title: Beer Tour!
data.text: loved every minute. everyone was very knowledgeable and accommodating. I'd recommend it to anyone, even if you're not a beer lover.

data.title: Took the "Boos" tour last weekend--It was great!
data.text: We had an awesome time on the Halloween "Boos" Tour last weekend,  We enjoyed all the micro-brewery stops, and our tour guide was very knowledgeable and a lot of fun.  We will definitely take another Hogshead Tour in the future.

data.title: Hogs Head Beer Tour
data.text: Such a fun experience driving around to local breweries in Vanny and our tour guide Laura was wonderful! I would definitely recommend it!

data.title: Beer Tour
data.text: We had an awesome Saturday afternoon celebrating my husband's 40th birthday! Loved Vanny and our tour guide Helen was awesome! We learned a lot and enjoyed some delicious local craft beer. Will definitely do another tour in the future!

data.title: Wine and cider tour
data.text: Awesome experience with great tour guide! Enjoyed getting to see places we didn't even know existed. We will definitely be back to try the beer tour next!

data.title: Great Saturday visiting the burgeoning micro-brews in Fayetteville
data.text: Spent a great day visiting Fossil Cove, Columbus House, and Apple Blossom breweries.  Dustin was a fantastic guide and Vanny is the only way to get around.  We had a great tour of Columbus House with very personal touch by the owners.  Fossil Cove had some great beers, and finished up with Apple Blossom where we could wash down some fries with cold suds.

data.title: Best Birthday Celebration EVER!!!!
data.text: Who knew there were so many craft breweries in NWA???  We celebrated Tim's 47th birthday with a surprise tour!!  It was a BLAST!!  We learned so much and Dustin was an outstanding tour guide!  He is extremely knowledgable!!  The tour was entertaining and educational.  Vanny is AMAZING!!  I highly recommend this tour for locals who enjoy craft beer and visitors looking for some local fun.

data.title: Craft Beer in NWAR
data.text: To celebrate our anniversary, my husband and I opted for a tour of three local craft breweries in Northwest Arkansas through Hogshead Tours.  It was a fun and safe way to experience local craft beer in style.  Riding in the Hogshead Tour van, Vanny, was easily one of my favorite things about the tour!  Appleblossom Brewery, Columbus House, and Fossil Cove were the three breweries we visited offering a variety of craft beer.  Our guide included a tour inside the brewery making it educational and entertaining.

data.title: WOW!  A day to remember for two sisters -- 90 and 87
data.text:
I requested help and they returned my request with a day my 90 year old Aunt and 87 year old Mother will cherish forever.  We drove to Fayetteville to celebrate my Aunt's birthday.  We were looking for a fun day for the two of them.  

Lora was an awesome guide and very kind. We had a private tour for the three of us.  Thank you, Lora and Hogshead tour!

data.title: Specialty Tour / Farm and Cheese
data.text: I can't say enough good things about the time we had while on this tour.  It began with a cheese making lesson.  Snacks and drinks were provided from local wine, kombucha, and beer, to bread, cheese, and chocolate!  We then headed to local mercantile that tickled our tastebuds with macarons, tea, and truffles!  We experienced local artisan's work and ended our day on a beautiful farm setting with a bountiful garden full of flowers, fruits, and vegetables.  We enjoyed more drinks and a full dinner while visiting with those on our tour.   As we started the tour only knowing each other, we  ended the tour meeting four others we would love to see more often and knowing much more about our community.  Hogshead tours knows how to treat their guests.  Lora and Dustin were so attentive and helpful throughout the day and we couldn't have asked for a better day!

data.title: Beer Tour
data.text: Had a fun afternoon visiting 3 different breweries in Fayetteville. The guide was a delight and very knowledgeable.  Loved riding around in "Vanny"!  Looking forward to trying some of the other tours!

data.title: Great tour with good friends
data.text: Pickup was prompt, and tour guide was very knowledgeable. Always took time to let the group know what beers best fit their preferences and where food could be found. Also took the time to allow everyone to have an extra drink at a location if it was agreed upon by the group.  Highly recommended.

data.title: Loads of fun
data.text: Had the opportunity to take a 3-hour tour with Hogshead with my wife and two friends.  I reached out to the owners a few weeks prior to see if we could book an earlier tour and they accommodated my request.  Pick-up at our hotel was on time and the tour guide was very knowledgeable as well as a lot of fun.  Tried a number of beers and had the opportunity to go behind the scenes at some of the breweries.  Great tour for anyone who likes beers or interested in the local scene.

data.title: Super fun night!!  Wonderful driver and hostess!!!
data.text: Shannon, our driver and hostess for the evening, picked us up at our home and dropped us back off after the tour.  She took us to 3 different breweries and was super helpful in picking out tastings, making sure we always had a table, and never needed anything!  She really was wonderful!  Riding in the VW van was really fun too!!  We can't wait to do the tour up north in the fall!

data.title: Great experience! Highly recommend!
data.text: We did a custom tour for a bachelorette party, and we couldn't be happier with our experience! Six of us were picked up and taken to Black Apple Crossing, Sassafrass Springs, and Apple Blossom. Our tour guide (and the co-owner of Hogshead Tours) was very friendly and fun. She arranged for personal tours from the owner/manager at each location, which made the experience feel personalized and educational. We loved touring the local beer and wine scene in a safe and fun way!

data.title: A great way to spend your day with friends
data.text: This was such a great way to spend my boyfriend's 30th birthday! The folks at Hogshead Tours were super easy to work with and extremely nice. We were picked up on time and chauffeured to several breweries in NWA. We enjoyed the private tour of the brewery and most of all, the great beer {they give you PLENTY}. We cant wait to take the North and Cidery tours this summer and fall. Thanks Hogshead Tours!

data.title: Awesome experience!!!
data.text: My husband and I took this tour for his birthday and we loved it! The tour requires at least 4 people so we joined another group of 4, and we had so much fun! The atmosphere and breweries makes it really easy to get to know the others on your tour. Our tour guide was incredibly friendly and was able to answer every question we had about local breweries. The VW van made the tour that much cooler! I highly recommend!

data.title: Tour the beer scene in a safe and fun way
data.text:
We booked this tour as birthday gift for my husband with a few other family members.  Jason picked us up on time in vanny (way cool by the way) and indulged us in several group photos before we got going.  The group consisted of my husband and I, my sister + brother in law (we are all in our early 30s) and my parents (65/66 years old) and we are all at different levels on the love of beer scale.
  
On the way to each brewery Jason told us a bit about the company, how they got started and other interesting tidbits.  Each brewery gave us a tour in a fun/educational way, took questions and we were able to try several of their beers.  Jason was kind enough to assist my mom is selecting her beers based on the big brand beer that she likes.  We all truly enjoyed the tour and found some new beers that we like.  I would highly recommend this tour to any group, it was fun for our whole family and I look forward to trying the wine tour some day.  

Huge thanks to Hogshead Tours for bringing a creative and fun experience to Fayetteville.

data.title: Always a good time with Hogshead Tours!
data.text: Hogshead Tours is always a good time! We've been twice and what I really like about it is that both tours were very different from each other, but equally awesome! If you're looking for something new and different to do with your friends, this is definitely something I'd recommend!

data.title: Beer tour in Fayetteville
data.text: I've done several tours with Hogshead and they have all been awesome. The guides are always knowledgeable and very nice. They are also flexible when setting up the private tours with pick up and drop off locations along with the breweries that you want to go to. The tours are always a great time!
